The restiction site is not active anymore after adapter ligation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"399ld","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63uke","text":"When sequencing, the first 18 nt will be the T7 promoter sequence and the next 6 nt of the cut-site. Please keep in mind that the beginning of the reads will have zero diversity (the T7 promoter sequence + cut site). Pool it with other libraries of high diversity, spike-in with a lot of PhiX or consider using several adapters with different length of N-padding before the T7 sequence (not tested yet but should work):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e84r8","text":"RAD_P1.1_pad-T7-PstI: ACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCGATC[pad]TAATACGACTCACTATAGTGCA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5eun3","text":"RAD_P1.2_pad-T7-PstI: [5phos]CTATAGTGAGTCGTATTA[pad]GATCGGAAGAGCGTCGTGTAGGGAAAGAGTGT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmt8i","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83ulc","text":"RAD P2 adapter, MseI-compatible (RAD-P2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mfcj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjj05","text":"RAD_P2.1_MseI-bio: [5biotin]GTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGCTCTTCCGATCT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cer81","text":"RAD_P2.2_MseI: [5phos]TAAGATCGGAAGAGCGAGAACAA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3jor","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckiek","text":"The above oligonucleotides are annealed to form adapter compatible with MseI restriction enzyme overhang (5'TA). Restriction site is present after ligation, so the adapter can be removed by MseI before probes transcription. One of the strands is 5'biotinylated, this allows separating strands with P2 adapter ligated using streptavidine beads and discarding fragments with P1 adapters on both ends. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcs4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s8qi","text":"PCR primers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9belu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp1a1","text":"PCR_F: AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGAT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f23en","text":"PCR_F_indexed: AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACxxxxxxxxACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1p0","text":"PCR_R_indexed: CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATxxxxxxxxGTGACTGGAGTTCAGACGTGTGC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3j8v","text":"PCR_R_post: CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGAT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alrfd","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f96ch","text":"Depending on the decision to use single or double indexing for your libraries and the probes use the combination of either unindexed forward and indexed reverse or both indexed primers. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5d7p9","text":"Choose a few fresh samples coming from different populations (if possible, to capture the diversity of the targeted species). The DNA samples should be diluted to the same concentrations, ideally at 20-50 ng/μl. If you need to sequence the probes library, you should keep the samples separated for the next steps, until they are indexed in a PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"uoab","text":"Mix 20 μl of DNA with 80 μl of master mix A1 (total volume = 100 μl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eqfh2","text":"Incubate 3 hours at 37°C, hold at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20uje","text":"Perform AMPure cleanup with the beads:sample ratio 2:1 according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Resuspend in 20 μl of 10 mM Tris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vv01","text":"Prepare RAD-P1 adapters. You need to anneal:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"medp","text":"RAD-P1.1_T7-PstI with RAD-P1.1_T7-Pst2 to obtain RAD-T7-P1 adapter (10 μM) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50qqe","text":"RAD_P2.1_MseI-bio with RAD_P2.2_MseI to obtain RAD-P2 adapter (10 μM)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"642eo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e029u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ai52o","text":"Heat the mix for 1 min at 95°C, cool down to 10°C with ramp 0.1°C/s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mdie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sche","text":"The annealed adapters can be stored long-term at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colWidths":[306,75],"data":[["reagent","volume [μl]"],["first oligonucleotide (100 μM)","10.0"],["second oligonucleotide (100 μM stock)","10.0"],["RNase-free water","70.0"],["Annealing buffer (10x)","10.0"]],"guid":"EF3F1C3228FF11EBAEE80A58A9FEAC2A","mergeCells":[],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ho6i","text":"Mix 19 μl of digested DNA with 2 μl of RAD-T7-P1 adapter (10 μM) and 2 μl of RAD-P2 adapter (10 μM). Briefly vortex and spin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dndbg","text":"Add 5 μl of master mix 2 to the digested DNA with adapters (total volume = 28 μl). Briefly vortex and spin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16td","text":"Incubate 3 hours at 16°C, hold at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"32h4n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fj87a","text":"There is no need to heat-kill the enzyme as you do not pool the samples until after the PCR step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mibd","text":"Perform AMPure cleanup with the beads:sample ratio 1.5:1 according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Resuspend in 60 μl of 10 mM Tris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq8qn","text":"Perform Pippin Prep size selection using 30 ul of the sample according to the instructions, keeping another 30 μl in case the size selection fails. You obtain 40 μl of the size selected sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5v8c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"21n5n","text":"Calculate the desired fragment sizes by doing in silico digestion. if you need to guess (i.e. no reference genome), aim for an insert of a mean lenght of 200 bp, a broader range for small genomes, narrower for large genomes. You need to add 90 nt of the technical sequences when calculating the size selection range.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"al4tl","text":"Measure concentration and check the profile of the sample using Fragment Analyzer/Tapestation/Bioanalyzer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5e7lo","text":"Dispense 30 μl of beads in a PCR tube (for each capture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

Mix by pippeting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":23},{"style":"bold","offset":84,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80vas","text":"Program the termocycler for two steps (both steps with a heated lid):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d8i6p","text":"5 min at 95°C,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6bk7a","text":"16-24 h at hybridization temperature (see below)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eatha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bsd9a","text":"Usual hybridization temperature is 65°C. For rare targets like aDNA, incubation can last for up to 40 hours at lower temprature of 60 or 55°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49rp1","text":"Incubate the library + blocking mix 5 min at 95°C (1st step).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lmeb","text":"When thermocycler temperature decrease to the hybridization temperature (2nd step), put the tubes with the hybridization mix in the thermocycler, incubate the library and hybridization mix for 5 more minutes at 65°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sopq","text":"Still at the hybridization temperature, add 18 μl of the hybridization mix to the library+blocking mix and mix by pippeting. Total volume is now 30 μl. Do not take the mixture out from the PCR machine to vortex or centrifuge at this step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":82,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fnqi","text":"Incubate at the hybridization temperature for 16-24 hours (up to 40 hours and lower temperature for rare targets like aDNA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lofu","text":" Mix well Dynabeads C1, make sure that all the beads are resuspended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5e7lo","text":"Dispense 30 μl of beads in a PCR tube (for each capture).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qnh8","text":"Wash 1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b2vcv","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3mbgs","text":"remove and discard supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4sfqh","text":"take the tube off the magnetic rack,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"10ca1","text":"resuspend in 200 μl of TEN.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8o8j8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2df5d","text":"Wash 2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ujs","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a0slk","text":"remove and discard supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4qrpf","text":"take the tube off the magnetic rack,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"lnma","text":"resuspend in 200 μl of TEN.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5oqql","text":"Wash 3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"46j7a","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3r467","text":"remove and discard supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"drbhe","text":"take the tube off the magnetic rack,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91cui","text":"resuspend in 70 μl of TEN.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8sji2","text":"Store at room temperature until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81or","text":"Prepare the aliquots of the wash buffers and Dynabeads in TEN and prewarm them to the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsh85","text":"Keeping the hybridization reaction in a thermocycler at the hybridization temperature with the heated lid, add 70 ul of the Dynabeads in TEN to the 30 μl of the hybridization reaction and mix well by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b0cl","text":"Incubate for 30 min at the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hpjo","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"D37CFA37990443EAB2A960D9C13B923F","id":"78432","label":"incubation with Dynabeads","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"t1p3","text":"Wash 1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ek7q","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bbf90","text":"remove supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fie60","text":"resuspend beads in 180 μl of 1x SSC / 0.1% SDS prewarmed to the hybridization temperature,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8a7hn","text":"mix well by vortexing, briefly centrifuge.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ntie","text":"Incubate for 15 min at the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sm87","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"900","guid":"AC8DFFC030A941AEA2975B63A98D6448","id":"78433","label":"incubation after the 1st wash","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"197hl","text":"Wash 2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9dpuh","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7t5dn","text":"remove supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1n4sd","text":"resuspend beads in 180 μl of 0.1x SSC / 0.1% SDS prewarmed to the hybridization temperature,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a0fjf","text":"mix well by vortexing, briefly centrifuge.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rmbo","text":"Incubate for 10 min at the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"749q2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"600","guid":"3CD7551A64C742AEBFE755344F19C106","id":"78434","label":"incubation after the 2nd wash","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr301","text":"Wash 3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"irn4","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1lgaf","text":"remove supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"18jiu","text":"resuspend beads in 180 μl of 0.1x SSC / 0.1% SDS prewarmed to the hybridization temperature,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"17f3m","text":"mix well by vortexing, briefly centrifuge.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a09ta","text":"Incubate for 10 min at the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"445u8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"600","guid":"E257A3888F1C4EE19C33DD534F5BA7E8","id":"78435","label":"incubation after the 3rd wash","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6i01","text":"Wash 4:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bui4f","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7pe3n","text":"remove supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9srvk","text":"resuspend beads in 180 μl of 0.1x SSC / 0.1% SDS prewarmed to the hybridization temperature,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"34rlm","text":"mix well by vortexing, briefly centrifuge.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"splg","text":"Incubate for 10 min at the hybridization temperature in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3etbh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":"600","guid":"72DAA38FE1BC40F1A4EA43557CD76452","id":"78436","label":"incubation after the 4th wash","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmusc","text":"If you use Kapa HiFi Hot Start polymerase mix in the next steps you can keep the captured DNA on the beads and proceed to step 68.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"733hk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"crrjn","text":"Otherwise elute the DNA from the probes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"54n1i","text":"put on the magnetic rack, wait until the beads separate,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5p2ep","text":"remove supernatant,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7fqs","text":"add 30 μl of 95°C 10 mM Tris,","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7rvc4","text":"mix well by pipetting.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7esrc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8vkv1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ntn2","text":"Incubate for 10 min, 95°C in a thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5430m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3263445505D04660A9E769BF156DBBCE","id":"78437","label":"DNA elution incubation","preset":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45d2q","text":"Put on the magnet; remove and retain the supernatant. \nThis supernatant contains the hybridization-enriched products!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2a05q","text":"Discard the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c7re","text":"Prepare re-amplification master mix. The volumes are per one capture-enriched library:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gvc1","text":"   reagent volume [μl]   water 14.1   Q5 polymerase buffer (5x) 10.0   dNTP mix (25 mM each) 0.4   PCR_F primer (5 μM) 5.0   PCR_R_post primer (5 μM) 5.0   Q5 hot-start DNA polymerase (2 U/μl) 0.5   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":199}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r2hn","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[226,73],"data":[["reagent","volume [μl]"],["water","7.5"],["KAPA HiFi HotStart ReadyMix","25.0"],["PCR_F primer (5 μM)","5.0"],["PCR_R_post primer (5 μM)","5.0"]],"guid":"672C8010B72611E88916D1DB482D0BED","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["reagent","volume [μl]"],["water","7.5"],["KAPA HiFi HotStart ReadyMix","25.0"],["PCR_F primer (5 μM)","5.0"],["PCR_R_post primer (5 μM)","5.0"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23],"show_headers":true}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eiqhc","text":"Mix 42.5 μl of the master mix with 7.5 μl of the capture-enriched library.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7kbk","text":"PCR program for KAPA HiFi HotStart ReadyMix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62sq2","text":"3 min at 95°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehqik","text":"15 cycles* of:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u42a","text":"20 s at 98°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2076","text":"15 s at 60°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lm4e","text":"30 s at 72°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89nc6","text":"5 min at 72°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8joqp","text":"hold at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ave4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cejtj","text":"* optimize the number of PCR cycles to obtain enough number of molecules for sequencing while using as few PCR cycles as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3b8ae","text":"Purify with AMPure using beads:sample ratio 1:1, elute in 30 μl of 10 mM Tris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc4dr","text":"Verify the library profile and molarity using Fragment Analyzer/Tapestation/Bioanalyzer. Libraries can now be pooled in equimolar ratios.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5qrmr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1di6q","text":"Your libraries are now ready to be sent for sequencing, congratulations!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
